newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Malaysia '96 external debt at 79 bln rgt - Negara.
newsitem.headline: Malaysia '96 external debt at 79 bln rgt - Negara.

text.p: Malaysia's total outstanding external debt rose to 78.99 billion ringgit last year from 73.69 billion ringgit in 1995, Bank Negara said in its 1996 annual report published on Friday.

"Debts denominated in U.S. dollars continued to dominate with a substantially larger share of 72 percent of total debt outstanding at the end of 1996 (65 percent in 1995)," the central bank report said.
Debt servicing fell in 1996, with total interest payments and principal repayments decreasing by 6.2 percent to 12.2 billion ringgit, the report said.
